hooks.command: npm install --silent && echo '✓ Dependencies installed' && (npx playwright install chromium --dry-run 2>&1 | grep -q 'browser is already installed' && echo '✓ Playwright browser ready' || (npx playwright install chromium 2>&1 | grep -E 'Downloaded' && echo '✓ Playwright browser installed' || echo '⚠ Playwright install failed, screenshots will use fallback method')) && (npm run dev > /tmp/eleventy-dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > /tmp/eleventy-dev.pid && sleep 3 && if curl -sf http://localhost:8080/ > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo '✓ Dev server running at http://localhost:8080/'; else echo '⚠ Dev server starting (check /tmp/eleventy-dev.log)'; fi)
